titles.title: A resolution designating September 2007 as "Adopt a School Library Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Leahy without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 342.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 9/7/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates September 2007 as "Adopt a School Library Month" to raise public awareness about the important role school libraries play in the academic achievement of children.
